name: Launch Ramp
description:
The Launch Ramp is curved for a smooth transition and taller jumps. Skate it by itself or connect it to the Freshpark Fun Boxes, Wedge Ramps, Grind Rails or other Launch Ramps.

- Foldable & Portable
- Durable & Weatherproof
- Modular/Interlocking

name: Fun Box
description: Switch from Fun Box to Manual Pad by interchanging the included leg sets. Use skateboard ramps and rails skate alone or connect to other Freshpark ramps and rails.

name: Freshpark Wedge Ramp
description:
Freshpark Wedge Ramp
Freshpark skateboard ramps are foldable, portable and easy to store. The powder-coated steel frames deliver superior strength. The weatherproof Urethane/ABS surface will not rot, warp or swell like wood. 

The flat Wedge skateboarding ramp may be used alone or connected to Freshpark Launch Ramps, Fun Boxes, and other Wedge Ramps, to create the ultimate professional-style skate obstacle.

name: 4 ft Quarterpipe
description:
Our 4 ft Quarterpipe sets up in minutes and connects side-by-side and back-to-back. Go as wide as you want or attach to other Freshpark ramps and rails. Detachable wheels make it portable and easy to store.

- Foldable & Portable
- Durable & Weatherproof
- Modular/Interlocking

name: 4 NYC private skateboarding lessons
description:
Package Plans**
Four Package Plan $300 - Four (4) one - hour lessons
What you will learn:
Beginner Courses 
• Learn how to stand on a skateboard, 
proper form and posture, turning left and right, 
excelerate and stop.
• Introduction to skateboard safety and how 
to fall the proper way.
• also private lessons can teach advances tricks.
from ollies to 360 kickflips, nollie180s to double kickflips
what ever trick your stuck on. learn it in just a few lessons

Lessons are taught by Louie

Easy Fun lessons,also includes special gifts .

name: Eight lessons package ( great for summer time )
description:
Eight lessons Package Plan* $600 
- Eight (8) one-hour lessons
• Learn how to stand on a skateboard, 
proper form and posture, turn left and right, 
excelerate and stop.
• Introduction to skateboard safety and how 
to fall the proper way.

* includes Introduction to Ramp Riding

Intermediate Courses
• Learn how to do kick turns, carve, 
drop ins,  rock to fakie, ollies, pumping 
fakie tails
• also private lessons can teach advances tricks.
from ollies to 360 kickflips, nollie180s to double kickflips
what ever trick your stuck on. learn it in just a few lessons

lesson are taught by luiz Louie

name: Tidalforce M750-X electric bike
description:
If you want the fastest electric bike made, this is it. The M-750X is powered by a 1,000 watt electric motor and NiMh batteries, there is nothing else like it. The feeling of speeding along at 30 mph on the M-750X is unmatched by any other electric vehicle.

This bike is made for the trail, and serious outdoor adventures. Made to carry 350 lbs., you can load this bike up with all your backpacking gear, a kayak, or enough food to have a picnic with your dozen closest friends. The aluminum monocoque frame, suspension fork and Shimano 21 speed drive train mark this as a serious mountain bike. The frame folds with Montague's simple hinge pin design for easy transport of the bike to a trailhead or on an airplane.

All the controls are mounted on the handlebar dash panel which has indicators for battery life and regenerative braking, a keyed ignition and a turbo switch which lets you regulate the maximum output of the motor. The M750-X will run without assistance for 15 miles per charge, and the range can be extended to 30 miles by pedaling along with the motor. It weighs 68 pounds fully loaded and can be charged in about 4 hours, with the included smart charger.

The M750-X is end all, be all, do all of electric bikes. Nothing can stop it. If you simply need the best, this is the bike to buy.

this bike was use by me ,also the battery is NEW with no miles too .
